column2: Have third parties represented in the 2016 Presidential election debates.
column5:
Millions of voters get their information about the presidential candidates by watching the debates.

As it stands right now the Commission on Presidential Debates was established by Democratic and Republican parties - they have kept third parties out while the people of this country want them in. Please sign the petition and have your voice heard.

Both Democrats and Republicans intentionally ignore the deep problems and corruption facing our government out of deference to the financial elites that keep them in power. Citizens United being passed with both parties at the helm was a huge red flag that our democracy is being eroded by both parties.

Because our electoral system is created to favor a two party system,The Commission on Presidential Debates 2016"
column8: As it stands right now the Commission on Presidential Debates was established by Democratic and Republican parties - you have kept third parties out while the people of this country want them in. \r\n\r\nIts time we have a new conversation in this country and that means new ideas and visions in politics. Maybe its time the people create a new platform for Presidential debates that represent the voice of the people in this country - not the parties.
